There are three different methods to book a time.

### Method 1. Faculty and non-WVU students 

[Link to booking website](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/12414cb0519440e68f70cc1fb2a63fac@mail.wvu.edu?anonymous)


## Method 2. WVU Students

[Right-click and choose to open this link in a new private browser window. Then continue as an anonymous user](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/12414cb0519440e68f70cc1fb2a63fac@mail.wvu.edu?anonymous)


## Method 3. Embed

Click *Continue as Guest* in the window below.
